Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound  Reroute near 87th/Holland
ShortDescription: WB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Holland, 83rd, Vincennes and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Holland, 83rd, Vincennes and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Holland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
